abstract.t: This document describes the BDP_FRAME extension for QUIC. The frame enables the exchange of Congestion Control (CC) parameters related to the path characteristics between the receiver and the sender during a connection. These CC parameters allow a receiver to prepare to use any additional capacity that is made available when using Careful Resume. It also allows a receiver to request that previously computed CC parameters, are not used when the receiver has additional information about the current path or traffic that is to be sent.
